general.gigTitle: develop your website, CRM, saas, mvp on bubble

sellerCard.description:
I'm a computer science graduate working as a full-stack no-code developer for the last four years. 

I help startup founders, SMBs, and enterprises scope, build, and launch their Websites, MVPs, SaaS, Marketplaces, CRMs, Custom Apps, Internal Tools, and automation using Bubble, Zapier, Make, and Airtable.

I specialize in mobile responsive design, API integration, backend workflow, Plugin development, UI/UX, and Ongoing maintenance for your Bubble apps.

description.content:
About me:

I help startup founders, SMBs, and enterprises scope, build, and launch their Websites, MVPs, SaaS, Marketplaces, CRMs, Custom Apps, Internal Tools, and automation using Bubble, Zapier, Make, and Airtable.


Numbers:

⭐ 𝟰+ 𝘆𝗲𝗮𝗿𝘀 of expertise in Bubble.io & Make.com

⭐ 𝟮𝟱+ 𝗽𝗿𝗼𝗱𝘂𝗰𝘁𝘀 developed from scratch, including SaaS, MVPs, CRMs, and Marketplaces

⭐ 𝟯𝟬𝟬𝗸+ 𝘂𝘀𝗲𝗿 sign-ups achieved on MVPs I've built

⭐ 𝟭𝟱𝟬𝗸+ 𝗨𝗦𝗗 raised by founders through the apps I developed.


You will get:

~ Mobile responsive design

~ API Integration

~ Privacy Rules

~ Database structuring

~ Workflow optimization

~ Complex workflow development

~ UI/UX Design from Figmaa to Bubble

~ Plugin development

~ Automation using Make & Zapier

~ Payment Integration

~ Consultation & Documentation


If you are a startup founder looking to develop an MVP, a business owner trying to digitalize the processes or automate the day-to-day operations, passionate about no-code, and want to learn from an expert - get in touch now.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is your process?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
1. Discovery Call
2. Scope sessions (max 2)
3. Design
4. Development
5. Testing
6. Launch
7. Support
8. Maintenance

questionsAndAnswers.question: What about price / cost?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: As I build custom software, the price depends on your scope. But 80% of projects that I developed come in at the $4k-$15k range.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I have any custom features I want?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
Your whole app is custom-built, and I can build whatever you need.

There are no restrictions on what you can do, and as your product and business grow, I can give technical advice on what you might want to add/remove/or build outside of the existing structure.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is your tech stack?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I'm comfortable working with Notion, Zapier, Make, Airtable, Xano, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to extend the functionality of your bubble app.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you do on-going work for me?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely. I am here to become a part of your tech team as your business grows. Many of my clients want ongoing improvements or additional features added to their products later, and I am here to support all future work.

reviews.comment:
I’ve been working with Ehsan on building a marketplace app, and I honestly couldn’t be more impressed. His attention to detail is absolutely immaculate.

When I started, I created a detailed guide outlining exactly what I wanted from the app and sent it to multiple developers. To test who had really reviewed it, I asked them all a simple question about my guide and the app. Ehsan was the only one who got it right, which made choosing him an easy decision – and it was absolutely the right one.

His professionalism and dedication to the project have been exceptional. Every aspect of his service has been delivered to an incredibly high standard. I couldn’t recommend Ehsan enough!
Always wonderful to work with Ehsan. Perfect in every way and easy to move projects along! Thank you again!
Ehsan and team's work was great. The delivery quality was fantastic and the communication was always prompt

seller_response.comment:
Working with Deepak was an incredible experience. Together, we successfully transformed his idea from Figma into a fully functional Bubble application within 5-6 weeks. While the project had its challenges—especially with pyment gateway integration like Stripe and PyPal—we ultimately decided to move forward with PyPal after thorough testing. Initially, transactions took several minutes to complete, but through custom API integrations and leveraging multiple plugins from the Bubble marketplace, we reduced the transaction time to just 2 - 4 seconds.
-
Throughout the process, Deepak’s patience, understanding, and flexibility were invaluable as we navigated research and development (R&D) hurdles. Ultimately, we delivered a user-friendly, high-quality application ready for launch. I look forward to supporting him with future feature updates and scaling the product further!

consultationData.description: Hey! I can consult you for Bubble Application Development specifically in MVP design, Quotes, API integration, Responsive Design, security, Technical Audits, and much more. Let's connect.
